entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023
